javadoc:
Context mix-in interface that ActionContexts can implement if they can provide a list of
 {@link Data} object's {@link ProgramLocation}'s.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the number of {@link Data} objects for the current action context.
@return the number of {@link Data} objects for the current action context.
methods.name: getCount
methods.comment: Returns the number of Data objects for the current action context.

return.comment: the number of Data objects for the current action context.

methods.javadoc:
Returns a list of the locations of the current {@link Data} objects in the current action context.
@return a list of the locations of the current {@link Data} objects in the current action context.
methods.name: getDataLocationList
methods.comment: Returns a list of the locations of the current Data objects in the current action context.

return.comment: a list of the locations of the current Data objects in the current action context.

methods.name: getDataLocationList
methods.comment: Returns a list of the locations of the current Data objects in the current action context that pass the given filter.

params.name: filter
params.comment:
a filter to apply to the current context's Data list, null
 implies all elements match.

return.comment: a list of the locations of the current Data objects in the current action context that pass the given filter.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the program for the current action context.
@return the program for the current action context.
methods.name: getProgram
methods.comment: Returns the program for the current action context.

return.comment: the program for the current action context.

name: DataLocationListContext
comment:
Context mix-in interface that ActionContexts can implement if they can provide a list of
 Data object's ProgramLocation's.
